text: Fairbourne railway station is the terminus of the 12¼ inch gauge Fairbourne Railway (FR), from which narrow gauge trains run from Fairbourne to Barmouth Ferry railway station. Cambrian Line services depart from the identically named Fairbourne railway station, located just opposite the FR station. |- |colspan=5|Interchange with on the Cambrian Line Category:Fairbourne Railway Category:Heritage railway stations in Gwynedd Category:Arthog
title: Fairbourne railway station (Fairbourne Railway)
